title: Switch: Activación automática (Workflow avanzado - 6 pasos)
description: This n8n workflow uses 6 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems, process data according to defined rules, and perform actions without human intervention.
